articles.title: About this site
articles.description:
This website is a compilation of works that I've done for **ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications** module in Semseter Jan-Apr 2022 during my SMU MITB (Analytics) journey!

I am Clarence, a full-time Master student at Singapore Management University, undertaking Master of IT in Business (Analytics Track).
Feel free to connect with me @ [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/clarencetay/).

articles.title: Visual Analytics by Clarence Tay
articles.description: Welcome to my humble website. No food or drinks are served.

            Bio
            Clarence is (kinda) halfway through his postgraduate
            studies (Master of IT in Business - Analytics) at Singapore
            Management University.
            Having spent more than a decade in the petrochemical
            industry, he is keen and looking forward to venture into the
            data analytics/science territories.
            
            
            Education
            Singapore Management University |
            Singapore
            Master of IT in Business (Analytics Track) | August 2021
            till date
            National University of Singapore |
            Singapore
            Bachelor of Technology, Chemical Engineering | August
            2009 - August 2014
            
            
            Experience
            Ministry of Health | Data Analytics
            Intern | January 2022 - June 2022
            ExxonMobil | Chemical Engineer / Process
            Technician | December 2007 - April 2021
